item.title: 法国兴业银行业绩增长得益于证券交易和法国零售业复苏
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）第三季度业绩大幅超出分析师预期，原因是其投资银行家们从更高的交易收入中获利，而且这家法国零售银行也扭亏为盈。【原文：Societe Generale SA broadly beat analysts’ estimates in the third quarter, as its investment bankers profited from higher trading revenue and the French retail bank turned the corner.】

item.title: 印度债券大年十月六个月来首次受挫
item.description: 外国投资者本月将净卖出印度债券，这是自 4 月份以来的首次，当地通胀回升和美国收益率飙升冷却了对卢比债券的兴趣。【原文：Foreign investors are set to net sell Indian bonds this month for the first time since April with a pickup in local inflation and a surge in US yields cooling appetite for rupee debt.】

item.title: 香港首家去主权证券交易委员会上市仍令该行业陷入困境
item.description: 继香港首家由特殊目的收购公司收购的公司上市后，香港的一长串此类交易工具仍在努力寻找目标或获得监管部门的批准。【原文：After Hong Kong’s first listing of a firm acquired by a special purpose acquisition company, a long line of such deal vehicles in the city continues to struggle to find targets or receive regulatory approval.】

item.title: 网络安全神童为何疯狂入侵网络？
item.description: 一位网络神童在保护公司免受入侵的同时，继续通过自己的一系列黑客行为积累数据。【原文：A cyber prodigy defended companies against intrusion while continuing to amass data through a series of his own hacks.】

item.title: 监管调整推动印度细价股上涨 7 万倍
item.description: 本周，印度一家名不见经传的投资和金融服务公司的股价飙升了 7 万倍，成为全球最大的股价飙升之一，这要归功于证券监管机构对规则的调整。【原文：Shares of a little-known investment and financial services firm in India soared 70,000-fold this week in one of the biggest moves globally, thanks to a rule tweak by the securities regulator.】

item.title: 2027 年前液化天然气市场将持续紧张
item.description:
对买方市场的预期正在液化，导致进口国，尤其是欧洲的进口国受到挤压。【原文：

Expectations for a buyer’s market are liquefying, leaving importing nations squeezed, particularly in Europe.

】

item.title: 债券巨头对英国多年来最令人期待的预算案的反应
item.description: 随着英国多年来最令人期待的预算案尘埃落定，投资者正在拼凑金边债券市场的下一步。【原文：As the dust settles on the UK’s most anticipated budget for years, investors are piecing together a picture of what comes next for the gilt market.】

item.title: 外资抛售，印度股市迎来四年来最差一个月
item.description: 由于海外投资者的持续抛售，印度 NSE Nifty 50 指数将创下自 2020 年 3 月大恐慌以来的最大单月跌幅。【原文：India’s NSE Nifty 50 Index is set to record its largest monthly decline since the March 2020 pandemic panic, amid persistent selling by overseas investors.】

item.title: 研究称，特朗普关税将导致韩国经济萎缩
item.description: 据一家隶属于政府的智库称，如果唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫并提高对贸易伙伴的关税，韩国经济将可能出现萎缩。【原文：South Korea’s economy would likely suffer a contraction if Donald Trump returns to the White House and ratchets up tariffs against trading partners, according to a government-affiliated think tank.】

item.title: 谁也没想到金边债券守夜人会出现
item.description:
但蕾切尔-里夫斯已经做好了准备，她在英国的第一份预算案中获得了及格—— 还是有点严厉 — 。【原文：

But Rachel Reeves was as ready as she could be, and got a pass — still somewhat stern — on her first UK budget.

】

item.title: 策略师认为日本央行声明影响有限，等待上田的回应
item.description: 市场策略师认为，日本央行周四的政策声明对日元和日本股市的初步影响有限，他们的焦点将转向行长上田一夫下午 3:30 左右在东京举行的新闻发布会。【原文：Market strategists see limited initial impact on the yen and Japanese stocks from the Bank of Japan’s policy statement on Thursday, with their focus turning to the Governor Kazuo Ueda’s press conference around 3:30 p.m. in Tokyo.】

item.title: 经济刺激引发不确定性，中国企业债券销售下滑
item.description: 在过去的两个月里，中国企业在国内出售的债券数量是 2021 年以来最少的，因为它们要应对不断上升的借贷成本以及与政府刺激计划相关的不确定性。【原文：Chinese firms sold the least amount of bonds domestically in the past two months since 2021, as they navigated rising borrowing costs and uncertainties tied to the government’s stimulus plans.】

item.title: 选举暴力风险威胁美元主导地位
item.description: 对于长期以来将美国体制的完整性视为国家经济实力基础的投资者来说，另一场充满暴力的总统竞选是一个无法估量的风险。【原文：The scenario of another contested presidential race riven by violence looms as an unpriced risk for investors who have long counted on US institutional integrity as a foundation for the nation’s economic strength.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长称风险可能需要暂停降息
item.description: 捷克央行一位高层人士表示，捷克经济正面临一系列潜在的通胀风险，因此需要考虑暂停降息。【原文：The Czech economy is confronting a series of potential inflationary risks that warrant a consideration of pausing interest rate cuts, a top central banker said.】

item.title: Pinnacle US Holdings 竞得 Blink Fitness 资产
item.description: 根据周三晚些时候提交的一份法庭文件，Pinnacle US Holdings 在周一的拍卖中以 1.21 亿美元成功竞得连锁健身房 Blink Fitness 的资产。【原文：Pinnacle US Holdings successfully bid for gym chain Blink Fitness’ assets for $121 million following an auction on Monday, according to a court filing late Wednesday.】

item.title: 期权交易员准备好应对美国投票引发的印度股市剧烈波动
item.description: 期权交易商押注美国大选将引发印度股市的剧烈波动。【原文：Options traders are betting the US election will trigger a wild move in the Indian stock market.】

item.title: 世界上最脏的燃料之一正在涨价
item.description: 全球石油市场中最肮脏的一角正在上演一场精彩的反弹，原因是为避开中东动乱而航行更长航程的船只需求激增。【原文：One of the dirtiest corners of the global oil market is staging a spectacular rally, boosted by surging demand from ships sailing longer voyages to avoid unrest in the Middle East.】

item.title: 两只追踪香港和中国股票的 ETF 在沙特阿拉伯上市
item.description: 随着亚洲城市与石油资源丰富的沙特阿拉伯王国之间的投资和金融联系日益密切，两只追踪香港和中国股票的交易所交易基金本周将在沙特阿拉伯首次亮相。【原文：Two exchange-traded funds tracking shares in Hong Kong and China are debuting in Saudi Arabia this week, as investments and financial links between the Asian city and the oil-rich kingdom grow.】

item.title: Swiggy 以 13 亿美元的价格在印度上市，与大手笔 IPO 的魔咒抗争
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变后，日元对美元汇率维持在狭窄区间内
item.description: 在普遍预期日本央行将维持利率不变的决定之后，日元兑美元汇率在狭窄区间内波动，交易员们一直在猜测与其他国家的巨大利率差距何时会缩小。【原文：The yen fluctuated in a tight range against the dollar after a widely expected decision by the Bank of Japan to stand pat on interest rates kept traders guessing on when the huge rate gap with other countries will narrow.】

item.title: 电装宣布回购 29 亿美元股票后股价上涨
item.description: 电装公司（Denso Corp. ）宣布计划回购价值高达 4,500 亿日元（29 亿美元）的自有股票，随后该公司股价上涨。【原文：Denso Corp. shares rose after the company announced plans to buy back up to ¥450 billion ($2.9 billion) worth of its own shares.】

item.title: 台湾在关闭交易所后为超强台风 "天鸽 "做好准备
item.description: 超强台风 "天鸽 "是今年晚些时候袭击台湾的最大风暴之一，台湾居民正严阵以待，以应对它的直接袭击，因此台湾暂停了 2.5 万亿美元股票市场的交易。【原文：Taiwan has suspended trading on its $2.5 trillion stock market as residents brace for a direct hit from Super Typhoon Kong-Rey, one of the biggest storms to strike the island this late in the year.】

item.title: 韩国芯片产量 14 个月来首次下降
item.description: 韩国的半导体产量一年多来首次出现同比下降，这再次表明全球人工智能发展所推动的繁荣周期可能开始降温。【原文：South Korea’s semiconductor production fell from a year earlier for the first time in more than a year, in another sign that a boom cycle fueled by artificial intelligence development worldwide may be starting to cool.】

item.title: 亚洲投资级美元债券利差收窄至历史新低
item.description: 在中国政策制定者采取了一系列货币和财政刺激措施，提升了亚洲债务的吸引力之后，亚洲评级最高的债券发行商的美元债券利差收窄至历史最低点。【原文：Dollar bond spreads for Asia’s top-rated issuers have narrowed to a record low after a blitz of monetary and fiscal stimulus measures by Chinese policymakers boosted the appeal of the region’s debt.】

item.title: Coinbase 承诺再为加密货币提供 2500 万美元政治资金
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 又向数字资产行业政治行动委员会 Fairshake 提供了 2500 万美元的资金，该委员会已成为美国大选中颇具影响力的一员。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. committed another $25 million of funding to Fairshake, a political action committee for the digital-asset industry that has become an influential player in the US election.】

item.title: 美国大选引发避险需求，黄金接近历史纪录
item.description: 受美国大选前避险需求的提振，以及可能影响美联储今年降息幅度的数据的影响，黄金交易量接近创纪录水平。【原文：Gold traded near a record, boosted by haven demand before the US election and shrugging off data that could influence the size of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 在线保险公司水滴计划在香港二次上市
item.description: 在美国上市的水滴公司（Waterdrop Inc. 首席执行官沈鹏表示，该公司正在考虑在香港进行二次上市，以寻求在金融中心拓展保险业务。【原文：US-listed Waterdrop Inc. is looking at a secondary listing in Hong Kong as it seeks to expand its insurance business in the financial hub, according to Chief Executive Officer Shen Peng.】

item.title: 三星芯片利润令人失望，显示人工智能内存面临挑战
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）主营芯片业务的利润不及市场预期，反映出这家韩国科技领军企业在利润丰厚的人工智能芯片领域奋力追赶。【原文：Profit at Samsung Electronics Co.’s mainstay chip operations missed market expectations, reflecting the Korean tech leader’s struggles to catch up in lucrative AI chips.】

item.title: 库存下降后石油涨势扩大，中东成为关注焦点
item.description: 在美国原油库存减少之后，石油连续第二个交易日上涨，市场正在关注中东地区是否会爆发任何潜在的冲突。【原文：Oil rose for a second session after US crude inventories shrank, with the market monitoring the Middle East for any potential flare-up.】

item.title: 模型失效，量化对冲基金在中国失去优势
item.description: 中国量化对冲基金面临结束多年来跑赢大盘的风险，因为上个月受政府经济刺激计划刺激，当地股市大涨，打破了他们的模型，挤压了空头头寸。【原文：China’s quantitative hedge funds risk ending years of outperforming the market, after a surge in local stocks spurred by the government’s economic stimulus package last month beat their models and squeezed short positions.】
